results.title: Develop applications with LangChain and Microsoft Foundry - Microsoft Foundry
results.description: Develop applications with LangChain and Microsoft Foundry Note This document refers to the Microsoft Foundry (classic) portal. 🔍 View the Microsoft Foundry (new) documentation to learn about the new portal. LangChain is a developer ecosystem that makes it easier to build reasoning applications. You can use models deployed to Microsoft Foundry.

You can enable tracing for LangChain that follows OpenTelemetry standards as per.
